name: CompX International Inc.
description: CompX International Inc. is a leading manufacturer of security products and performance-related components. Established in 1994, CompX has built a strong reputation for quality and innovation in the manufacturing sector. The company operates primarily in the United States and Canada, offering a wide range of products including locking mechanisms, security products, and high-performance components for various applications. CompX serves multiple industries such as marine, office furniture, and the recreational vehicle market, ensuring their solutions meet the diverse needs of their customers. With a commitment to excellence, CompX utilizes advanced manufacturing techniques and a skilled workforce to produce high-quality products that are recognized for their durability and reliability. The company is dedicated to maintaining strong relationships with its clients and continuously seeks to improve its processes and products through research and development. CompX is also focused on sustainability and reducing its environmental impact by implementing eco-friendly practices in its operations. As a publicly traded company, CompX is committed to transparency and shareholder value, making strategic decisions that support long-term growth and profitability.
